channel.title: Real VPS Tutorial
channel.description:
[SIZE="7"]VPS[/SIZE] Hey guys, today Im gonna tell you how we set up a VPS.
Q: What kind of VPS is this for? A: This is only for windows VPS', not for Linux.
Where are we gonna go trough?
- [I]Buying a [B]VPS.[/B][/I] - [I]Connecting to [B]VPS.[/B][/I]
[SIZE="6"]Buying a VPS:[/SIZE] [url=http://www.vpsland.com/index.html][img]http://www.vpsland.com/images/logo_site.gif[/img][/url] I preffer [url=http://www.VPSLand.com]http://www.VPSLand.com[/url] They deliver within 24 hours. And it works with Remote Desktop Control. [I] I will add more VPS sellers soon.[/I]
Click windows VPS [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2zi69nm.jpg[/img]
You can choose between 2003 or 2008 Plans, this is just the version of windows. [URL=http://www.vpsland.com/windowsplans.html][IMG]http://www.vpsland.com/images/windows2003.jpg[/img][/URL][url=http://www.vpsland.com/windowsplans.html][IMG]http://www.vpsland.com/images/windows2008_ov.jpg[/img][/url]
Just click the order button right under the price. 2003 - 18$ (quick-link): [url=https://cp.vpsland.com/hspc/plans.php?series_key=508&windows=2003] [IMG]http://www.vpsland.com/images/order_orangex.gif[/img][/url]
Q: [I]What's the difference between a [U]2003[/U] plan and a [U]2008[/U] plan?[/I] A: [B]A 2008 plan has more disk space, and it's a newer version of Windows.[/B]
Q: [I]What's the difference between a [U]expensive[/U] and a [U]cheap[/U] [B]VPS[/B]?[/I] A: [B]The more RAM, disk space and bandwidth it has, the more expensive it is. Sometimes it has more dedicated ip adresses. In a few words: It just has more. [/B]
Well after you clicked a "order" button, fill in everything you can, you might get a little bit different screen. Q: [I]Why do I need to fill in [U]everything[/U]?[/I] A: [b]When there is a [U]problem[/U] with your [B]VPS[/B] or it doesn't get deliverd.[/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/x51r0x.jpg[/img]
[SIZE="4"][B]CREDITCARD[/B][/SIZE]: ([I]SKIP IF USING PAYPAL[/I]) [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29xgqwm.jpg[/img] Click to continue [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/15oh006.jpg[/img] Further steps on [url=http://www.VPSLand.com]http://www.VPSLand.com[/url] [SIZE="4"][b]PAYPAL[/b][/SIZE]: ([I]LOOK ABOVE FOR CREDITCARD[/I]) Click to continue [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/15oh006.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zlfzmt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/55gnxu.jpg[/img]
Login to your paypal account and pay it.
[I][SIZE="4"]You now bought your VPS. Congrats![/SIZE][/I]
Next on, [SIZE="6"]Connecting to your VPS.[/SIZE]
Open START on your computer, which have different forms like: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1949qo.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i619.photobucket.com/albums/tt277/Your-Death/tut1.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/5a050g.jpg[/img]
But all of you obviously know that...
[SIZE="4"]On Vista:[/SIZE] Click start and type, or copy - paste: [code]%systemroot%/system32/mstsc.exe [/code] This will pop up, click options. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/vi2n8k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29ld8o3.jpg[/img] [SIZE="4"]On 2000/ME/XP:[/SIZE] Click start and click RUN. Type in RUN: [code]%systemroot%/system32/mstsc.exe [/code] and open. This will pop up, click options. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/vi2n8k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29ld8o3.jpg[/img] Enter your VPS-ip. (Which is probaly mailed to you)
You might need a password. Connect and it will look like this: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/j6k9ro.jpg[/img]
Please comment, tell me if it helped you and if you liked it. Suggest what I should add or tell me what isn't clear.
Thanks, TehCow. [SIZE="1"]I don't want to be pushy, but I would very appreciate when this gets stickied.[/SIZE]

item.title: Real VPS Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @tehcow tehcow
item.description:
@tehcow wrote:

[SIZE=“7”]VPS[/SIZE]
Hey guys, today Im gonna tell you how we set up a VPS.

Q: What kind of VPS is this for?
A: This is only for windows VPS’, not for Linux.

Where are we gonna go trough?

  • Buying a VPS.
  • Connecting to VPS.

[SIZE=“6”]Buying a VPS:[/SIZE]

I preffer http://www.VPSLand.com
They deliver within 24 hours. And it works with Remote Desktop Control.

I will add more VPS sellers soon.

Click windows VPS

You can choose between 2003 or 2008 Plans, this is just the version of windows.

Just click the order button right under the price.
2003 - 18$ (quick-link):

Q: What’s the difference between a 2003 plan and a 2008 plan?
A: A 2008 plan has more disk space, and it’s a newer version of Windows.

Q: What’s the difference between a expensive and a cheap VPS?
A: The more RAM, disk space and bandwidth it has, the more expensive it is. Sometimes it has more dedicated ip adresses. In a few words: It just has more.

Well after you clicked a “order” button, fill in everything you can, you might get a little bit different screen.
Q: Why do I need to fill in everything?
A: When there is a problem with your VPS or it doesn’t get deliverd.

[SIZE=“4”]CREDITCARD[/SIZE]: (SKIP IF USING PAYPAL)

Click to continue

Further steps on http://www.VPSLand.com
[SIZE=“4”]PAYPAL[/SIZE]: (LOOK ABOVE FOR CREDITCARD)
Click to continue


55gnxu.jpg767×130

Login to your paypal account and pay it.

[SIZE=“4”]You now bought your VPS. Congrats![/SIZE]

Next on,
[SIZE=“6”]Connecting to your VPS.[/SIZE]

Open START on your computer, which have different forms like:

But all of you obviously know that…

[SIZE=“4”]On Vista:[/SIZE]
Click start and type, or copy - paste:

%systemroot%/system32/mstsc.exe

This will pop up, click options.


[SIZE=“4”]On 2000/ME/XP:[/SIZE]
Click start and click RUN.
Type in RUN: %systemroot%/system32/mstsc.exe and open.
This will pop up, click options.


Enter your VPS-ip. (Which is probaly mailed to you)

You might need a password. Connect and it will look like this:

j6k9ro.jpg1410×872

Please comment, tell me if it helped you and if you liked it.
Suggest what I should add or tell me what isn’t clear.

Thanks,
TehCow.
[SIZE=“1”]I don’t want to be pushy, but I would very appreciate when this gets stickied.[/SIZE]

Read full topic
